mfm.fluorescence.fcs package¶

Submodules¶

mfm.fluorescence.fcs.fcs module¶

Module contents¶

mfm.fluorescence.fcs.weights(times: 'np.array', correlation: 'np.array', measurement_duration, mean_count_rate, weight_type: 'str' = None) → 'np.array'[source]¶
Parameters

  • times (<built-in function array>) – correlation times [ms]

  • correlation (<built-in function array>) – correlation amplitude

  • measurement_duration – measurement duration [s]

  • mean_count_rate – count-rate [kHz]

  • weight_type (Optional[str]) – weight type ‘type’ either ‘suren’ or ‘uniform’ for

uniform weighting or Suren-weighting

Return type

<built-in function array>
